CodeList.Name: Multiple Sclerosis Quality of Life-54 Instrument Questionnaire Test Code

Description.TranslatedText: Multiple Sclerosis Quality of Life-54 Instrument test code.

EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCSynonym: MSQL1-Would You Say Your Health Is
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: Multiple Sclerosis Quality of Life-54 Instrument - In general, would you say your health is:
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:PreferredTerm: MSQOL-54 - Would You Say Your Health Is

EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCSynonym: MSQL1-Health Now Compared to 1 Year Ago
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: Multiple Sclerosis Quality of Life-54 Instrument - Compared to one year ago, how would you rate your health in general now?
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:PreferredTerm: MSQOL-54 - Health Now Compared to One Year Ago

EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: Multiple Sclerosis Quality of Life-54 Instrument - Does your health limit you in these activities: Vigorous activities, such as running, lifting heavy objects, participating in strenuous sports.
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:PreferredTerm: MSQOL-54 - Health Limit Vigorous Activities

EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: Multiple Sclerosis Quality of Life-54 Instrument - Does your health limit you in these activities: Moderate activities, such as moving a table, pushing a vacuum cleaner, bowling, or playing golf.
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:PreferredTerm: MSQOL-54 - Health Limit Moderate Activities

EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: Multiple Sclerosis Quality of Life-54 Instrument - Does your health limit you in these activities: Lifting or carrying groceries.
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:PreferredTerm: MSQOL-54 - Health Limit Lifting or Carrying Groceries

EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: Multiple Sclerosis Quality of Life-54 Instrument - Does your health limit you in these activities: Climbing several flights of stairs.
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:PreferredTerm: MSQOL-54 - Health Limit Climbing Several Stairs

EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: Multiple Sclerosis Quality of Life-54 Instrument - Does your health limit you in these activities: Climbing one flight of stairs.
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:PreferredTerm: MSQOL-54 - Health Limit Climbing One Stair

EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: Multiple Sclerosis Quality of Life-54 Instrument - Does your health limit you in these activities: Bending, kneeling, or stooping.
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:PreferredTerm: MSQOL-54 - Health Limit Bending, Kneeling or Stooping

EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCSynonym: MSQL1-Health Limit Walk More Than Mile
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: Multiple Sclerosis Quality of Life-54 Instrument - Does your health limit you in these activities: Walking more than a mile.
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:PreferredTerm: MSQOL-54 - Health Limit Walking More than A Mile

EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: Multiple Sclerosis Quality of Life-54 Instrument - Does your health limit you in these activities: Walking several blocks.
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:PreferredTerm: MSQOL-54 - Health Limit Walking Several Blocks

EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: Multiple Sclerosis Quality of Life-54 Instrument - Does your health limit you in these activities: Walking one block.
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:PreferredTerm: MSQOL-54 - Health Limit Walking One Block

EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: Multiple Sclerosis Quality of Life-54 Instrument - Does your health limit you in these activities: Bathing and dressing yourself.
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:PreferredTerm: MSQOL-54 - Health Limit Bathing and Dressing Yourself

EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: Multiple Sclerosis Quality of Life-54 Instrument - During the past 4 weeks, have you had any of the following problems with your work or other regular daily activities as a result of your physical health: Cut down on the amount of time you could spend on work or other activities.
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:PreferredTerm: MSQOL-54 - Physical Health Cut Down Time on Work

EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: Multiple Sclerosis Quality of Life-54 Instrument - During the past 4 weeks, have you had any of the following problems with your work or other regular daily activities as a result of your physical health: Accomplished less than you would like.
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:PreferredTerm: MSQOL-54 - Physical Health Accomplish Less

EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCSynonym: MSQL1-Phys Health: Limit Kind of Work
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: Multiple Sclerosis Quality of Life-54 Instrument - During the past 4 weeks, have you had any of the following problems with your work or other regular daily activities as a result of your physical health: Were limited in the kind of work or other activities.
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:PreferredTerm: MSQOL-54 - Physical Health Limited in the Kind of Work

EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: Multiple Sclerosis Quality of Life-54 Instrument - During the past 4 weeks, have you had any of the following problems with your work or other regular daily activities as a result of your physical health: Had difficulty performing the work or other activities.
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:PreferredTerm: MSQOL-54 - Physical Health Difficulty Perform Work

EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: Multiple Sclerosis Quality of Life-54 Instrument - During the past 4 weeks, have you had any of the following problems with your work or other regular daily activities as a result of any emotional problems: Cut down on the amount of time you could spend on work or other activities.
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:PreferredTerm: MSQOL-54 - Emotional Problem Cut Down Time on Work

EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: Multiple Sclerosis Quality of Life-54 Instrument - During the past 4 weeks, have you had any of the following problems with your work or other regular daily activities as a result of any emotional problems: Accomplished less than you would like.
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:PreferredTerm: MSQOL-54 - Emotional Problem Accomplish Less

EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: Multiple Sclerosis Quality of Life-54 Instrument - During the past 4 weeks, have you had any of the following problems with your work or other regular daily activities as a result of any emotional problems: Didn't do work or other activities as carefully as usual.
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:PreferredTerm: MSQOL-54 - Emotional Problem Did Not Do Work Carefully

EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: Multiple Sclerosis Quality of Life-54 Instrument - During the past 4 weeks, to what extent has your physical health or emotional problems interfered with your normal social activities with family, friends, neighbors, or groups?
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:PreferredTerm: MSQOL-54 - Extend Physical Health or Emotional Problem Interfere With Social Activities

EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCSynonym: MSQL1-How Much Bodily Pain Have You Had
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: Multiple Sclerosis Quality of Life-54 Instrument - How much bodily pain have you had during the past 4 weeks?
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:PreferredTerm: MSQOL-54 - Bodily Pain

EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCSynonym: MSQL1-Did Pain Interfere With Your Work
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: Multiple Sclerosis Quality of Life-54 Instrument - During the past 4 weeks, how much did pain interfere with your normal work?
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:PreferredTerm: MSQOL-54 - Pain Interfere With Normal Work

EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCSynonym: MSQL1-Did You Feel Full of Pep
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: Multiple Sclerosis Quality of Life-54 Instrument - How much of the time during the past 4 weeks: Did you feel full of pep?
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:PreferredTerm: MSQOL-54 - Feel Full of Pep

EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCSynonym: MSQL1-Have Been a Very Nervous Person
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: Multiple Sclerosis Quality of Life-54 Instrument - How much of the time during the past 4 weeks: Have you been a very nervous person?
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:PreferredTerm: MSQOL-54 - Been a Nervous Person

EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCSynonym: MSQL1-Have Felt So Down in the Dumps
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: Multiple Sclerosis Quality of Life-54 Instrument - How much of the time during the past 4 weeks: Have you felt so down in the dumps that nothing could cheer you up?
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:PreferredTerm: MSQOL-54 - Felt So Down Nothing Could Cheer You Up

EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCSynonym: MSQL1-Have You Felt Calm and Peaceful
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: Multiple Sclerosis Quality of Life-54 Instrument - How much of the time during the past 4 weeks: Have you felt calm and peaceful?
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:PreferredTerm: MSQOL-54 - Felt Calm and Peaceful

EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCSynonym: MSQL1-Did You Have a Lot of Energy
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: Multiple Sclerosis Quality of Life-54 Instrument - How much of the time during the past 4 weeks: Did you have a lot of energy?
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:PreferredTerm: MSQOL-54 - Have a Lot of Energy

EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: Multiple Sclerosis Quality of Life-54 Instrument - How much of the time during the past 4 weeks: Have you felt downhearted and blue?
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:PreferredTerm: MSQOL-54 - Felt Downhearted and Blue

EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: Multiple Sclerosis Quality of Life-54 Instrument - How much of the time during the past 4 weeks: Did you feel worn out?
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:PreferredTerm: MSQOL-54 - Feel Worn Out

EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCSynonym: MSQL1-Have You Been a Happy Person
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: Multiple Sclerosis Quality of Life-54 Instrument - How much of the time during the past 4 weeks: Have you been a happy person?
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:PreferredTerm: MSQOL-54 - Been a Happy Person

EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: Multiple Sclerosis Quality of Life-54 Instrument - How much of the time during the past 4 weeks: Did you feel tired?
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:PreferredTerm: MSQOL-54 - Feel Tired

EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCSynonym: MSQL1-Did You Feel Rested on Waking
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: Multiple Sclerosis Quality of Life-54 Instrument - How much of the time during the past 4 weeks: Did you feel rested on waking in the morning?
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:PreferredTerm: MSQOL-54 - Feel Rested Waking in the Morning

EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: Multiple Sclerosis Quality of Life-54 Instrument - During the past 4 weeks, how much of the time has your physical health or emotional problems interfered with your social activities?
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:PreferredTerm: MSQOL-54 - Time Physical Health or Emotional Problem Interfere With Social Activities

EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCSynonym: MSQL1-Get Sick Easier Than Other People
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: Multiple Sclerosis Quality of Life-54 Instrument - How TRUE or FALSE is each of the following statements for you: I seem to get sick a little easier than other people.
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:PreferredTerm: MSQOL-54 - Get Sick Easier Than Other

EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCSynonym: MSQL1-I Am as Healthy as Anybody I Know
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: Multiple Sclerosis Quality of Life-54 Instrument - How TRUE or FALSE is each of the following statements for you: I am as healthy as anybody I know.
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:PreferredTerm: MSQOL-54 - As Healthy as Anybody

EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCSynonym: MSQL1-I Expect My Health to Get Worse
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: Multiple Sclerosis Quality of Life-54 Instrument - How TRUE or FALSE is each of the following statements for you: I expect my health to get worse.
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:PreferredTerm: MSQOL-54 - Expect Health to Get Worse

EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: Multiple Sclerosis Quality of Life-54 Instrument - How TRUE or FALSE is each of the following statements for you: My health is excellent.
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:PreferredTerm: MSQOL-54 - Health is Excellent

EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: Multiple Sclerosis Quality of Life-54 Instrument - How much of the time during the past 4 weeks: Were you discouraged by your health problems?
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:PreferredTerm: MSQOL-54 - Discouraged by Health Problem

EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: Multiple Sclerosis Quality of Life-54 Instrument - How much of the time during the past 4 weeks: Were you frustrated about your health?
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:PreferredTerm: MSQOL-54 - Frustrated With Health

EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCSynonym: MSQL1-Was Health a Worry in Your Life
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: Multiple Sclerosis Quality of Life-54 Instrument - How much of the time during the past 4 weeks: Was your health a worry in your life?
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:PreferredTerm: MSQOL-54 - Health a Worry in Life

EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: Multiple Sclerosis Quality of Life-54 Instrument - How much of the time during the past 4 weeks: Did you feel weighed down by your health problems?
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:PreferredTerm: MSQOL-54 - Feel Weighed Down by Health Problem

EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: Multiple Sclerosis Quality of Life-54 Instrument - How much of the time during the past 4 weeks: Have you had difficulty concentrating and thinking?
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:PreferredTerm: MSQOL-54 - Difficulty Concentrating and Thinking

EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: Multiple Sclerosis Quality of Life-54 Instrument - How much of the time during the past 4 weeks: Did you have trouble keeping your attention on an activity for long?
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:PreferredTerm: MSQOL-54 - Trouble Keep Attention for Long

EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCSynonym: MSQL1-Have Had Trouble With Your Memory
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: Multiple Sclerosis Quality of Life-54 Instrument - How much of the time during the past 4 weeks: Have you had trouble with your memory?
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:PreferredTerm: MSQOL-54 - Trouble With Memory

EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: Multiple Sclerosis Quality of Life-54 Instrument - How much of the time during the past 4 weeks: Have others, such as family members or friends, noticed that you have trouble with your memory or problems with your concentration?
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:PreferredTerm: MSQOL-54 - Others Notice Your Problems With Memory or Concentration

EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: Multiple Sclerosis Quality of Life-54 Instrument - How much of a problem was each of the following for you during the past 4 weeks: Lack of sexual interest.
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:PreferredTerm: MSQOL-54 - Lack of Sexual Interest

EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: Multiple Sclerosis Quality of Life-54 Instrument - How much of a problem was each of the following for you during the past 4 weeks: Difficulty getting or keeping an erection.
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:PreferredTerm: MSQOL-54 - Difficulty Keeping an Erection

EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: Multiple Sclerosis Quality of Life-54 Instrument - How much of a problem was each of the following for you during the past 4 weeks: Inadequate lubrication.
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:PreferredTerm: MSQOL-54 - Inadequate Lubrication

EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: Multiple Sclerosis Quality of Life-54 Instrument - How much of a problem was each of the following for you during the past 4 weeks: Difficulty having orgasm.
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:PreferredTerm: MSQOL-54 - Difficulty Having Orgasm

EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: Multiple Sclerosis Quality of Life-54 Instrument - How much of a problem was each of the following for you during the past 4 weeks: Ability to satisfy sexual partner.
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:PreferredTerm: MSQOL-54 - Ability to Satisfy Sexual Partner

EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: Multiple Sclerosis Quality of Life-54 Instrument - Overall, how satisfied were you with your sexual function during the past 4 weeks?
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:PreferredTerm: MSQOL-54 - Satisfied With Sexual Function

EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: Multiple Sclerosis Quality of Life-54 Instrument - During the past 4 weeks, to what extent have problems with your bowel or bladder function interfered with your normal social activities with family, friends, neighbors, or groups?
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:PreferredTerm: MSQOL-54 - Bowel or Bladder Function Interfere With Social Activities

EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: Multiple Sclerosis Quality of Life-54 Instrument - During the past 4 weeks, how much did pain interfere with your enjoyment of life?
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:PreferredTerm: MSQOL-54 - Pain Interfere Enjoyment of Life

EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: Multiple Sclerosis Quality of Life-54 Instrument - Overall, how would you rate your own quality-of-life?
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:PreferredTerm: MSQOL-54 - Rate Your Own Quality of Life

EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCSynonym: MSQL1-Describe How Feel About Your Life
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: Multiple Sclerosis Quality of Life-54 Instrument - Which best describes how you feel about your life as a whole?
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:PreferredTerm: MSQOL-54 - Describe How You Feel About Your Life

CodeList.nciodm:CDISCSynonym: Multiple Sclerosis Quality of Life-54 Instrument Questionnaire Test Code
CodeList.nciodm:PreferredTerm: CDISC Questionnaire Multiple Sclerosis Quality of Life-54 Instrument Test Code Terminology
